title.rendered: India vs Pakistan Head to Head in T20: Stats, Most Runs, Leading Wicket-taker & More

content.rendered:
The contest between the two arch-rivals from Asia – India and Pakistan – is always billed as the most anticipated contest of any tournament they play in. This can be largely attributed to the long-standing rivalry between the two nations on the political stage which has often spilled onto the cricketing stage, making their fans turn up in large numbers to watch them fighting it out. The pressure of the contest is enormous and how the players respond to it makes the action in the middle watchable. 

India vs Pakistan Head-to-Head in T20Is:

The two teams have met on nine occasions in this format and India have enjoyed the upper hand with seven wins. The last time they met, during the last T20 World Cup, Pakistan trounced India to register a 10-wicket win. The loss was India’s first against Pakistan in a World Cup, 50-over and T20 included, after 12 consecutive wins.

India vs Pakistan Head-to-Head T20I Overall Stats:

India vs Pakistan Head-to-Head in T20 World Cup:

Highest Team Total in India vs Pakistan T20Is:

India scored 192/5 against Pakistan on 28 Dec 2012 at Ahmedabad.

Lowest Team Total in India vs Pakistan T20Is:

Pakistan was bowled out for 83 runs on 27 Feb 2016 at Mirpur

Highest Individual Score in India vs Pakistan T20Is:

Pakistan’s opening batter Mohammad Rizwan scored 79 runs against India during the T20 World Cup 2021, Super 12 match, on 24 Oct 2021

Best Bowling figures in India vs Pakistan T20Is:

Mohammad Asif took 4 wickets for 18 runs against India on 14 Sep 2007

Also Read:

India vs Pakistan, Asia Cup 2022: Fantasy Cricket Tips

Asia Cup 2022 Schedule, Full Squads, & Venues

Are you a responsible fantasy cricket player?

How to pick a winning fantasy team

Latest form

In 2022, India have been in an impressive form. They have played 19 matches, out of which they have come up victorious 14 times. Whereas, Pakistan played only one T20I match which they lost to Australia.

Are you excited about the India vs Pakistan match? Download the My11Circle fantasy app and get started now!
